To get a `String` object with a given value (e.g., `"Hello"`),
one needs to use the `String` constructor, like so: `new String("Hello")`.

frontmatter.shortDescription: One needs to call the String constructor to get a String object from a literal
frontmatter.shortCorrection: A String literal represents a String object and can be treated as such
